description: This file defines the `EventVariable` class in Java, which models a defined event from an XML schema, including methods for JSON serialization and C code generation.

classes.name: EventVariable
classes.description: Represents a defined event from the XML schema, providing methods for JSON serialization and C code generation related to event variables.

methods.name: EventVariable(EventVariable)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event variable with an ICEvent bean and sets its parent class name to 'BaseEvent'.

methods.name: isEvent()
methods.description: Returns true indicating this variable represents an event.

methods.name: getJavaType()
methods.description: Retrieves the Java type name, appending 'Event' if not already present.

methods.name: getAdapterNativeInitString(String)
methods.description: Generates a string of C code to initialize nested event or custom variables within this event.
